title: About
text: I am Nima (NEE-MA). What you see here is created by Quarto! I did my PhD in analyzing renewable energy data. I also contribute to open-source projects. I am currently working as Machine Learning Engineer in the financial corporation Manulife.

title: Why Quarto?
text:
Why did I choose quarto for building my blog?
I was looking for a simple way to publish posts. I tried to learn a little bit of HTML and CSS. However, I then realized that organizing those files is not an easy task for me. And, in fact, I did not want to be worried about that! All I want was a simple tool that allows me to write some text and maybe provide some images, and then tool takes care of the rest by rendering it to HTML format. I knew about quarto and I realized that it has supports for building blogs! I can write stuff in MarkDown and Quarto takes care of the rest!

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in my blog. Welcome!

My goal is to encourage myself to write about cool stuff. This can help me with gaining new skills as well as improving my writing skills. I think my future self will thank me! I set up blog twice before but didn’t like them. I like this one though! Let’s see if I can stick to this one!!
